body:
Victorian elegance at its finest with this turn of the century charmer. Steps to free ferry into Manhattan and next door to Historic Snug Harbor Cultural Center with Botanical gardens, Chinese Scholar's Garden, Tuscan Garden, Visual and Performing Arts Center and Children's Museum makes this mansion one of the most sought after places to be in NYC. Soon-to-be home of the largest Ferris wheel in the world, the neighborhood is definitely a place to check out. Formerly a well-known artist's castle, the home boasts 12' ceilings, 10' windows (all new), 6 fireplaces, 8 bedrooms, with formal living room and dining room, library, and eat -in cooks kitchen. Full third floor artist (writer, architects) dream studio/work space with incredible light @ 931 square feet. Have tea or hot chocolate on the Wrap around porch, only one block from the water with infamous Blue restaurant, convenient stores, cozy cafes, church, fruit/vegetable market within 1 blocks from the apartment. Another beautiful park (Clove Lakes Park) with a restaurant on the lake, paddleboats, bicycle path, track, baseball diamond, ice-skating rink, etc. and Silver Lake Golf Course are within close proximity. The St. George Theatre and Farmer's Market are all a short distance, as well.  3rd floor views of the NYC harbour. 

Great place for a group looking to stay 30 days or more. Hosts 16-24 people comfortably.
name: Furnished Rental for large groups

body:
Conveniently Located Single Family Home For Rent! Lovely colonial  This home features 3 bedrooms, 1 and Half baths, full finished basement Studio, Close to ferry terminal and downtown Manhattan.

This Home Is Located In Silver Lake. With Access To Yard. . Basement, Driveway For Parking, This Home Has Washer/Dryer Hook Ups  Tenant Pays For Water. Tenant Pays All Utilities and Gas . Tenant Responsible For 1 Month Rent, 1 Month Security Deposit, 1 Months Broker Fee. :	1st month rent, 1 months security, 1 month broker fee. Must apply with National Tenant Network for screening. Tenant pays all utilities and water. 

Please Email or Text me !

Yan (Alisa ) Xing 
917 636 8298 

AMERICAN HOMES GROUP : 718-981-3400
604 Forest Ave staten Island NY 10310
name: Entire House For Rent.

body:
Available now.  Beautifully updated 2 bedroom apartment on top floor of historic home.  Master BR fits queen size bed, lots of storage. New Berber carpet in both bedrooms.  Loft-like with high ceilings, lots of light, open concept kitchen-dining-living room, new wood floors. New DW in kitchenette.   Fully furnished, sleeps 3 people.  

views of lower Manhattan skyline from DR window.  ALL utilities in addition to cable TV and Wi-fi are included in the rent of $1,940.  

Access to back deck and front porch for seating, dining. Laundry available on premesis.   

Small pet ok.  

Walk to Manhattan ferry in 15 minutes or take bus in 5 mins.  S42 and S52 bus stops in front of house.  Driveway parking available, or free on street. Walk to dellies, restaurants, farmers market, Snug Harbor.

No Brokers fee.   First and last month's rent plus $1,000 damage deposit to move in.  
Reference and income check. 

If interested please email me your information, size of household, expected moving date, etc.  looking forward to hearing from you.

no smokers please.
name: Loft like includes All utilities, cable TV and wi-fi
